title: Innovation in Medical Education Fund
description: To provide support for medical student projects in the School of Medicine at the University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus.  If $50,000 is raised within three years or $25,000 within five years, the fund will be administered as a pure endowment.
marketingContent: Support of these projects may include, but is not limited to, cost of clinical supplies, training resources, educational books, volunteer recognition and/or other supplies needed to run the project.
